name: Tiny Garbage Man
description:
You’re a tiny Garbage Man living inside a semi underground waste container. All kinds of garbage are being dumped here and it’s your job to recycle it!

  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Right Mouse Button to grab an item
  • Hold Left Mouse Button to charge up power
  • Release Left Mouse Button to launch the item you’re holding

Keep an eye on the Garbage Meter When it’s full you’re covered in garbage and the game is over!

Try to recycle as many items as you can!
